text: Michel Bernard (3 November 1932 â€“ 19 February 2021) was a French politician. He was born in La Villedieu, France. Bernard was a member of the National Assembly of France from 1986 until 1988. Bernard died on 19 February 2021, aged 88. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Nouvelle-Aquitaine Category:People from Charente- Maritime
title: Michel Bernard (politician)
